posts.message: Nothing worse than time being in debt. Although it cannot be borrowed or lent, you can still run into the maze of its debt.

comments.comment: Time is just a subtle illusion.

posts.message: Be not afraid of greatness, some are born great, some attain greatness and some have greatness thrust upon them.

be brave. 
nothing better than having achieved something.
be kind.
nothing better than being remembered for your goodness.
today it might not be your day. there are still 364/365 days. keep faith

A platform where nobody knows who you are lets everyone share their thoughts without filters. You get all kinds of views, not just what big companies want you to see. People talk about what matters to them, not just what's on X. It's like a big playground where everyone's equal, and you can say what you want without worrying. This helps us hear different opinions and keeps us informed in our own way, not just what the big guys want us to know.

This is way better than X. Seriously.A site like this lets people talk openly and honestly, without any bias or control. Everyone's voice counts equally here, and it's all about sharing information openly. It beats corporate media hands down when it comes to real conversations. Give it a try yourself.

I was 5. I smashed a bee with a book, made holes in it's body using a pen. Smashed it once more, till it was juicy yum. Then dumped it in my garden. It was fun.

comments.comment: So much fun, I made juicy yum out of a rat once. It was greyish juicey red.
